quote_first: “You’ll have one by the side of your bed in a few years’ time, so you wouldn’t even need to go into your office,” said Su Ling, letting her head fall back on the pillow when she saw
quote_last: flick up on the bedside clock.
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: The primal flush of triumph which had saturated the American’s humor on this signal success, proved but fictive and transitory when inquiry of the station attendants educed the information that the two earliest trains to be obtained were the
quote_last: to Dunkerque and the 5:37 for Ostend.
title: The Black Bag
author: Louis Joseph Vance
